name: At The Shore: A Fairy Tale
name_original: At The Shore: A Fairy Tale
description:
This game was inspired by the Tennyo myths of Japan and Kate Chopin's The Awakening.

Writing and Narrative Design: Whitney “Strix” Beltrán

Art and Sound: Miranda Due
Programming: Andreia "shana" Gaita
With thanks to the TrainJam audio room.

Made during TrainJam 2019, Chicago to San Francisco.
